sentences: Akụkọ
Egwuregwu
Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu
Akụkọ
Egwuregwu
Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu
By Alys Davies
BBC News
Ebe foto si, Reuters
Onyeisiala Amerịka bụ Joe Biden na nwunye ya bụ Jill Biden oge ha batara n'ọdọụgbọelu Stansted dị na London
Onyeisiala mba Amerịka erutela London maka olili Ezenwaanyị Elizabeth nke ga-adị n'ụbọchị Mọnde.
Biden so na ndị nnukwu mmadụ 500 nke gụnyere ndị isi ala mba dị icheiche na ndị ọzọ na-abata na London, nke ga-abụ ọgbakọ ndị ọchịchị a na-ahụbeghi ụdị ya n'ọtụtụ afọ.
Praịm Mịnịsta mba Kanada bụ Justin Trudeau, nke Australia bụ  Anthony Albanese, na nke New Zealand bụ  Jacinda Ardern, anọrọlarị na UK.
Ndị ọzọ gụnyere Praịm Mịnịsta mba Bangladesh bụ Sheikh Hasina; Onyeisiala mba Sri Lankan bụ President Ranil Wickremesinghe, nakwa Onyeisiala mba India bụ President Droupadi Murmu.
Mana ọtụtụ mmadụ akatọọla ụfọdụ ndị e nyere akwụkwọ ka ha bịa olili ahụ, dịka Nwa Eze mba Saudi Arabia bụ Mohammed Bin Salman.
Ebe foto si, Reuters
Prime Minister mba Kanada bụ Justin Trudeau na nwunye ya bụ Sophie Trudeau denyere aha ha n'akwụkwọ ngụgụ obi e mepere na Lancaster House na London maka olil Ezenwaanyị
Onyeisiala mba France bụ Emmanuel Macron; nke Ireland bụ Taoiseach Micheal Martin; nke Germany bụ Frank-Walter Steinmeier; na nke Italy bụ Sergio Mattarella, so na ndị a na-atụ anya ha n'emume a.
Ndị ọzọ ga-anọkwa ya bụ ndị ezinụlọ obi eze niile dị na mpaghara Europe.
Ebe foto si, Reuters
Eze Charles III na Praịm Mịnịsta mba New Zealand bụ Jacinda Ardern nwere mkparịtaụka n'ụbọchị Satọde, Sepụtemba 17, 2022.
Ọtụtụ n'ime ndị ọbịa a ga-akwanyere Ezenwaanyị ugwu ikpeazụ ebe e debere akpati ozu ya na 'Westminster Hall', ma debanyekwa aha ha n'akwụkwọ ngụgụ obi nke e mepere n'ụlọ Lancaster.
Mana ebe anya niile ga-adị bụ n'ọgbakọ nke Eze Charles III ga-ehibe n'obieze Buckingham n'ụbọchị Sọnde.
Nke a nwere ike ịbụ ohere ndị isi ala na ndị ọchịchị dị icheiche nwere iji zute onwe ha ma nwee mkparịtaụka n'etiti onwe ha.
Ụfọdụ ndị a kpọrọ oku ka ha sonye n'emume olili a, akpatala nkatọ n'ebe ụfọdụ, ọ kachasị maka Nwa eze nakwa onye na-achịkọta Saudi Arabia bụ Mohammed Bin Salman.
Ebe foto si, Getty Images
Oge ikpeazụ Nwa eze Saudi Arabia bụ Mohammed Bin Salman zutere Ezenwaanyị Elizabeth bụ n'afọ 2018, n'obi eze Buckingham na UK
A na-ebo Mohammed Bin Salman ebubo na ọ bụ ya nyere iwu ka e gbuo Jamal Khashoggi n'ime ụlọ nnọchite anya mba Saudi nke dị na Turkey, n'afọ 2018, mana ya na gọọmentị ya na-ekwu na aka ya adịghị.
Nwaanyị Khashoggi chọburu ịlụ bụ Hatice Gengiz, kwuru na ekwesịghị ịhapụ Mohammed Bin Salman ka o sonye n'emume olili a maka na nke a ga-abụ ịmetọ ncheta Ezenwaanyị.
Ndị mmadụ katọkwara oku mba UK kpọrọ onyeisiala mba Chaịna bụ Xi Jinping ka  ọ bịa olili Ezenwaanyị, n'ihi ebubo mpụ na mmekpa ahụ nke a na-ebo gọọmentị China.
Mana ọ bụghị Onyeisiala Xi ga-abịa olili a, kama ọ bụ osote ya bụ Wang Qishan.
Ndị ọchịchị si mba Russia, Belarus, Myanmar, Syria, Venezuela na Afghanistan agaghị esonye chaachaa n'emume olili a.
Iran, North Korea (DPRK) na Nicaragua ga-ezite ndị nnọchịte anya ha, ọbụghị ndị isi ala ha ga-abịa.
Gọọmentị Naịjirịa ga-anọkwa n'olili Ezenwaanyị
Osote Onyeisiala Yemi Osinbajo agwalarị London iji sonye n'emume olili Ezenwaanyị echi bụ Mọnde, Sepụtemba 19.
Onye enyemaka mgbasaozi Osinbajo bụ Laolu Akande kwupụtara nke a n'ozi o zipụtara site n'akara Twitter ya.
Akande kwukwara na Osinbajo ga-esonyekwa ndị isi mba ọzọ n'ọgbakọ mba na mba a ga-enwe n'emume ahụ.
